languages.text: "Дела минувших дней, которые леди Иокаста не устает припоминать, словно сама там была. Мои предки провинились перед вашим предком и в наказание стали инфернусами на этом судне. При случае расскажу вам эту историю".

"It's a story of days long past, one that Mistress Sauerback greatly enjoys reminiscing about as if she was there herself. My ancestors committed a trespass against your ancestor and were made inferni as punishment. I'll be sure to tell you this tale some other time."
languages.original_text: "Дела минувших дней, которые леди Иокаста не устает припоминать, словно сама там была. Мои предки провинились перед вашим предком и в наказание стали инфернусами на этом судне. При случае расскажу вам эту историю".

languages.text: «Es una historia de tiempos pretéritos, aunque la maestra Sauerback parece disfrutar al rememorarla... como si hubiese estado allí. Mis antepasados invadieron a los suyos y, como castigo, fueron convertidos en infernus. Ya le contaré el cuento otro día».
languages.original_text: "It's a story of days long past, one that Mistress Sauerback greatly enjoys reminiscing about as if she was there herself. My ancestors committed a trespass against your ancestor and were made inferni as punishment. I'll be sure to tell you this tale some other time."

traits.locale_text: «Es una historia de tiempos pretéritos, aunque la maestra Sauerback parece disfrutar al rememorarla... como si hubiese estado allí. Mis antepasados invadieron a los suyos y, como castigo, fueron convertidos en infernus. Ya le contaré el cuento otro día».

languages.text: 「過去の話だというのに、ザウアーバック嬢はまるでその場にいたかのように嬉々として昔話をする。俺の先祖は君の先祖につけ込んで、その罰としてインフェルニになった。この話はまた別の機会に話そうじゃないか」
languages.original_text: "It's a story of days long past, one that Mistress Sauerback greatly enjoys reminiscing about as if she was there herself. My ancestors committed a trespass against your ancestor and were made inferni as punishment. I'll be sure to tell you this tale some other time."

traits.locale_text: 「過去の話だというのに、ザウアーバック嬢はまるでその場にいたかのように嬉々として昔話をする。俺の先祖は君の先祖につけ込んで、その罰としてインフェルニになった。この話はまた別の機会に話そうじゃないか」

languages.text: “那是个很久以前的故事，也是苏尔贝克女士非常津津乐道的故事，就好像她本人就是当事人一样。我的祖先曾经对您的祖先犯下过罪行，而作为惩罚，所有人都被贬为了控火行会的成员。等下次有机会，我一定会给您好好讲讲这个故事。”
languages.original_text: "It's a story of days long past, one that Mistress Sauerback greatly enjoys reminiscing about as if she was there herself. My ancestors committed a trespass against your ancestor and were made inferni as punishment. I'll be sure to tell you this tale some other time."

traits.locale_text: “那是个很久以前的故事，也是苏尔贝克女士非常津津乐道的故事，就好像她本人就是当事人一样。我的祖先曾经对您的祖先犯下过罪行，而作为惩罚，所有人都被贬为了控火行会的成员。等下次有机会，我一定会给您好好讲讲这个故事。”

languages.text: "Das ist eine uralte Geschichte, an die Meisterin Sauerback gerne erinnert, als wäre sie damals selbst dabei gewesen. Meine Ahnen haben eine Verfehlung gegen Eure Ahnen begangen und wurden zur Strafe Inferni. Ich werde Euch diese Geschichte irgendwann gewiss erzählen."
languages.original_text: "It's a story of days long past, one that Mistress Sauerback greatly enjoys reminiscing about as if she was there herself. My ancestors committed a trespass against your ancestor and were made inferni as punishment. I'll be sure to tell you this tale some other time."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist eine uralte Geschichte, an die Meisterin Sauerback gerne erinnert, als wäre sie damals selbst dabei gewesen. Meine Ahnen haben eine Verfehlung gegen Eure Ahnen begangen und wurden zur Strafe Inferni. Ich werde Euch diese Geschichte irgendwann gewiss erzählen."

languages.text: « C'est une très vieille histoire, une histoire que maîtresse Sauerback se plaît à évoquer comme si elle y avait assisté de ses yeux. Mes ancêtres ont commis une offense envers votre ancêtre et ont été condamnés à devenir inferni en guise de châtiment. Je ne manquerai pas de vous la raconter par le menu en temps opportun. »
languages.original_text: "It's a story of days long past, one that Mistress Sauerback greatly enjoys reminiscing about as if she was there herself. My ancestors committed a trespass against your ancestor and were made inferni as punishment. I'll be sure to tell you this tale some other time."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une très vieille histoire, une histoire que maîtresse Sauerback se plaît à évoquer comme si elle y avait assisté de ses yeux. Mes ancêtres ont commis une offense envers votre ancêtre et ont été condamnés à devenir inferni en guise de châtiment. Je ne manquerai pas de vous la raconter par le menu en temps opportun. »

languages.text: "Çok eski zamanlara ait bir hikâye. Sauerback Hanım, bu hikâyenin bahsini açmaktan âdeta kendi de oradaymış gibi keyif alır. Atalarım, sizin atalarınızın mülküne izinsiz giriş yapmış. Ceza olarak da itfacılara dönüştürülmüşler. Hikâyeyi size başka bir zaman muhakkak anlatırım."
languages.original_text: "It's a story of days long past, one that Mistress Sauerback greatly enjoys reminiscing about as if she was there herself. My ancestors committed a trespass against your ancestor and were made inferni as punishment. I'll be sure to tell you this tale some other time."
